title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy, comforting, and quick to make.
instructions: Cook pasta; fry pancetta; mix eggs and cheese; combine off-heat and toss quickly with pasta. Season with pepper.

title: Avocado Toast with Chili Flakes
description: A bright, healthy breakfast or snack.
instructions: Toast bread; smash avocado with lemon & salt; spread and sprinkle chili flakes.

title: Ramen Noodles
description: Warm, slurpable noodles in savory broth.
instructions: Cook noodles in broth; top with soft-boiled egg and scallions.

title: Lemon Pancakes
description: Light pancakes with a bright lemon twist.
instructions: Mix batter; cook on griddle until golden; serve with syrup and lemon zest.

title: Summer Salad
description: Fresh greens with a zesty dressing.
instructions: Toss ingredients with olive oil and lemon; season to taste.
